comments:

It looks like the no selection part is not causing the problem.  I set the scenario defaults preference to Bottom up EJB and ran into this exception when there is no selection or if a regular Java Bean file is initially selected.
Looks suspiciously like bug 119111 which was fixed nearly two weeks ago. Peter, in your scenario, have you configured any installed servers?

This problem was fixed as part of bug 119111. I'm suspecting there were no server runtimes suitable for Web services configured in the server preferences. I checked with the latest WTP 1.5 code and it still appears to be fixed. Please reopen if you can still reprouce this with the latest code in WTP.
